description: This source file defines a Flutter widget that displays a bottom sheet modal for creating or editing notes with tags input. It includes a function showNoteEditorModal that builds the UI components for inputting note title, content, and tags, and handles the submission logic.

methods.name: showNoteEditorModal
methods.description: Asynchronously displays a modal bottom sheet for creating or editing a note, pre-filling fields if an initial note is provided, and invoking a callback on submission.
